dynamic_elements.chart_title: Number of components of popular Italian rock bands
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(?item) AS ?count) 

WHERE { 

     ?band ?a wd:Q5741069 . # rock band  

     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q38 . # from italy

     ?band wdt:P527 ?item .  

     SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". 

          ?band rdfs:label         ?label. 

      } 

  

  

  

} 

GROUP BY ?label 

ORDER BY DESC(?count) 

LIMIT 30

dynamic_elements.chart_title: Top 10 Most influential rocks bands to the Italian rock bands
dynamic_elements.chart_query:
SELECT DISTINCT ?label (COUNT(distinct ?band) as ?count)  

WHERE { 

     ?band ?a wd:Q5741069 . # rock band  

     ?band wdt:P495 wd:Q38 . # from uk 

     ?band wdt:P737 ?influencer . 

          SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en". 

          ?influencer rdfs:label         ?label. 

      } 

} 

  

GROUP BY ?label ?count  

ORDER BY DESC(?count) 

LIMIT 20

dynamic_elements.table_title: The bands along with their pictures

dynamic_elements.table_query:
#standardSPARQL
SELECT ?inceptionYear (COUNT(?band) AS ?count)
WHERE {
  ?band wdt:P31 wd:Q5741069;           # Instance of: rock band
        wdt:P495 wd:Q38;               # Country of origin: Italy
        wdt:P571 ?inceptionYear.       # Year of inception

  SERVICE wikibase:label {
    bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en".
    ?band rdfs:label ?label.
  }
}
GROUP BY ?inceptionYear
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
LIMIT 20
